content.raw:
Something like this?

```
gz physics --profile <profile name> # sets the profile
gz physics --set <param name>=<param value>
gz physics --get <param name>
```

edit: I actually wasn't aware of the existing physics command line tools--you can set `iters`, `step-size` and `update-rate`. Generalizing this to setting any physics parameter from the command line seems like a natural extension of this work, though it could get complicated. It seems like at the bare minimum, `gz physics --profile <name>` is needed.
